sen.j: 今川 範政（いまがわ のりまさ）は、南北朝時代 (日本)から室町時代前期にかけての守護大名。
sen.e: Norimasa IMAGAWA was shugo daimyo (shugo, which were Japanese provincial military governors, that became daimyo, which were Japanese feudal lords) from the period of the Northern and Southern Courts through the early Muromachi Period.

sen.j: 駿河国今川氏の第4代当主。
sen.e: He was the fourth family head of the Imagawa clan in Suruga Province.

sen.j: 1409年、父・泰範の死により家督を相続する（泰範には没年に異説が多く、それ以前に家督を継いだとも考えられている）。
sen.e: In 1409, he took over as the family head due to his father, Yasunori's death (he may have become the family head before 1409, considering the various theories on the year of his death).

sen.j: 1416年に上杉禅秀の乱が起こると、上杉禅秀（禅秀）の攻撃を受けて鎌倉から逃亡してきた鎌倉公方・足利持氏を保護した。
sen.e: When the War of Zenshu UESUGI happened in 1416, he gave protection to Mochiuji ASHIKAGA who was Kamakura kubo (Governor-general of the Kanto region) taking flight from Kamakura because Zenshu attacked him.

sen.j: そして将軍・足利義持の命を受けて軍を率いて上杉房方らと共に鎌倉に攻め入った。
sen.e: Then, by order of shogun Yoshimochi ASHIKAGA, he led the army with Fusakata UESUGI to invade into Kamakura.

sen.j: そして禅秀らを討って乱を平定した。
sen.e: He defeated the army of Zenshu and managed to suppress the war.

sen.j: この折の功により範政は幕府の信任を得て、副将軍の重職に任ぜられることとなった。
sen.e: Winning the confidence of bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun), he was appointed to the important post of vice-shogun.

sen.j: その後、将軍が代替わりして足利義教の時代になると、範政は義教からの寵愛を受けて重用された。
sen.e: After Yoshinori ASHIKAGA succeeded as the next shogun, Norimasa, in favor with Yoshinori, was given important posts.

sen.j: 鎌倉公方の持氏と将軍の義教との対立が深まったときには、鎌倉の監視役を務めた。
sen.e: He worked as a watchdog over Kamakura when the confrontation between Kamakura kubo Mochiuji and shogun Yoshinori became serious.
